TestCase.Name: varying_1
TestCase.Description: varying declared in fragment shader, no reference in vertex shader

TestCase.Name: varying_2
TestCase.Description: varying declared in vertex shader, no reference in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_3
TestCase.Description: varying declared in both vertex and fragment shader, but not used

TestCase.Name: varying_4
TestCase.Description: varying declared in both shaders, statically used in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_5
TestCase.Description: varying declared and statically used in vertex shader, no reference in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_6
TestCase.Description: varying declared and statically used in vertex shader, only declared in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_7
TestCase.Description: varying statically used in both vertex and fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_differing_precision_1
TestCase.Description: varying declared as highp in vertex shader, but mediump in fragment shader

TestCase.Description: varying declared as highp in vertex shader, but lowp in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_differing_precision_3
TestCase.Description: varying declared as lowp in vertex shader, but mediump in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_type_mismatch_1
TestCase.Description: varying type mismatch (float vs. vec2), static use but no runtime use in the fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_illegal_usage_1
TestCase.Description: varying not declared in vertex shader, but statically used in fragment shader

TestCase.Name: varying_readback_1
TestCase.Description: read back (an already written) varying in the vertex shader

TestCase.Name: varying_writeback_1
TestCase.Description: write back a varying in the fragment shader

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload buffer data at the beginning of each iteration; use a low buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_bufferdata_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload buffer data at the beginning of each iteration, using glBufferData; use a low buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_delete_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Delete buffers at the end of each iteration, and re-create at the beginning of the next; use a low buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: wasteful_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Don't reuse buffers, and only delete them when given memory limit is reached; use a low buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: separate_attribute_buffers_wasteful_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Give each vertex attribute its own buffer; use a low buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload buffer data at the beginning of each iteration; use a high buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_bufferdata_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload buffer data at the beginning of each iteration, using glBufferData; use a high buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_delete_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Delete buffers at the end of each iteration, and re-create at the beginning of the next; use a high buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: wasteful_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Don't reuse buffers, and only delete them when given memory limit is reached; use a high buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: separate_attribute_buffers_wasteful_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Give each vertex attribute its own buffer; use a high buffer memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload texture data at the beginning of each iteration; use a low texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_teximage_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload texture data at the beginning of each iteration, using glTexImage*; use a low texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_delete_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Delete textures at the end of each iteration, and re-create at the beginning of the next; use a low texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: wasteful_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Don't reuse textures, and only delete them when given memory limit is reached; use a low texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload texture data at the beginning of each iteration; use a high texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_reupload_teximage_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Re-upload texture data at the beginning of each iteration, using glTexImage*; use a high texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: always_delete_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Delete textures at the end of each iteration, and re-create at the beginning of the next; use a high texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: wasteful_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Don't reuse textures, and only delete them when given memory limit is reached; use a high texture memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: client_memory_data
TestCase.Description: Use client-memory for index and attribute data, instead of GL buffers

TestCase.Name: vary_draw_function
TestCase.Description: Choose between glDrawElements and glDrawArrays each iteration, with uniform probability

TestCase.Name: few_big_calls
TestCase.Description: Per iteration, do a few draw calls with a big number of triangles per call

TestCase.Name: many_small_calls
TestCase.Description: Per iteration, do many draw calls with a small number of triangles per call

TestCase.Name: several_programs
TestCase.Description: Use several different programs, choosing between them uniformly on each iteration

TestCase.Name: several_programs_always_rebuild
TestCase.Description: Use several different programs, choosing between them uniformly on each iteration, and always rebuild the program

TestCase.Name: buffer_texture_wasteful_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Use both buffers and textures wastefully; use a low memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: random_low_memory
TestCase.Description: Highly random behavior; use a low memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: buffer_texture_wasteful_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Use both buffers and textures wastefully; use a high memory usage limit

TestCase.Name: random_high_memory
TestCase.Description: Highly random behavior; use a high memory usage limit
